20025000.Original_Text: 도대체 언제 오는 거야. 이래서야 같이 일을 못 해 먹겠구먼.
20025000.English_Text: Why is it taking so long? I can't work with them if it'll always be like this.
20025000.Chinese_Text: 到底什么时候才会来。真是没法一起做事。

20025002.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</> 녀석들이 자신들한테 일을 주면 \n싸고, 빠르고, 품질 좋게 해준다길래 믿었는데...
20025002.English_Text:
I entrusted the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> with the job because they said
they'd do it cheaper, faster, and better.
20025002.Chinese_Text:
四虎那些家伙说把事情交给他们就会
以低价快速、高效地办事，所以我才相信他们的...

20025003.Original_Text: 어제 와야 할 물건은 아직 도착하지 않았단 말이야. 허 참...
20025003.English_Text: The package should have arrived yesterday, but it isn't here yet.
20025003.Chinese_Text: 昨天就该到的东西还没到。真是...

20025004.Original_Text: 이래서야 같이 일을 할 수 있겠냐 이거지.\n아... 예전엔 상상도 할 수 없는 일인데 말이야.
20025004.English_Text:
Now I've got doubts about whether we can work together.
Ah, but... This is something we couldn't have even imagined back in the day.
20025004.Chinese_Text:
这样以后还怎么合作？
唉...这种事情在以前可是无法想象的。

20025005.English_Text: Was it different in the past?

20025006.Original_Text: 여기 처음에 왔을 때는 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 사람들이랑 같이 했었는데 눈빛이 달랐어.
20025006.English_Text:
When I first came here,
the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> people worked with had their sights set on different things.
20025006.Chinese_Text:
刚来这里的时候，
我们是跟风白门、艾瑞达的人一起合作的。他们的眼神非同寻常。

20025007.Original_Text: 모두 필사적이었지. 그에 비해 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</> 애들은 절박함 같은 게 없어.
20025007.English_Text: They were desperate. On the other hand, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> don't have that sense of urgency.
20025007.Chinese_Text: 每个人都显得很拼命。相比之下，四虎那些人没有一丝紧张感。

20025008.Original_Text: 자네가 가서 좀 물어봐 주지 않겠나?
20025008.English_Text: Could you go and ask for me?
20025008.Chinese_Text: 你可以帮忙去问一下吗？

20025009.Original_Text: 내가 가서 뭐라고 하면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</> 녀석들이 기가 죽을 것 같아서 말이야.
20025009.English_Text: The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> will be discouraged if I'm the one who goes to ask.
20025009.Chinese_Text: 我觉得只要你去说一声，四虎那些人就不会嚣张。

20025010.Original_Text: 물건 사러 오셨습니까? 제가 좀 바쁘니...\n저기 앞에 있는 신참에게 물어보시죠.
20025010.English_Text:
Did you come to buy something? I'm a little busy...
Could you ask our rookie over there?
20025010.Chinese_Text:
客人来买东西吗？我有点忙...
有事请问那边的新员工。

20025012.Original_Text: 아이고! 미리 말씀하시지. 그거요? 그거는... 그게 아마도...
20025012.English_Text: Oh, my! You should have told me. That? Th-that's pr-probably...
20025012.Chinese_Text: 哎哟！早说多好。那个吗？那个...那个大概是...

20025013.English_Text: Calm down and try to speak slowly.

20025014.English_Text: Hold on. I'll check our documents right away.
20025014.Chinese_Text: 请等一下。我需要看一下资料。

20025015.Original_Text: 그게 그러니까... 아! 이게 아직 납품이 안 된 거야?\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</> 담당자 도대체 뭐 하는 거야?
20025015.English_Text:
So, it's... Ah! This hasn't been delivered yet?
What on earth is the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Steel</> Manager doing?
20025015.Chinese_Text:
这个...啊！还没有交货？
金庚哲门负责人到底在干什么？

20025016.Original_Text: 죄송합니다. 제가 담당자한테 이야기해서 물건 확인하겠습니다.\n최대한 이른 시일 내에 배송해드리도록 하겠습니다.
20025016.English_Text:
I'm sorry. I will talk to the manager and have the package checked.
We'll deliver it as soon as we can.
20025016.Chinese_Text:
十分抱歉。我会让负责人确认货物。
我们会尽快送货到门。

20025017.English_Text: Would it be okay if I go and check it myself?
20025017.Chinese_Text: （问可不可以亲自去确认一下）

20025018.Original_Text: 굳이? 아니... 뭐 원하시면 안 될 거야 없지요.\n그럼 제가 위치를 알려드리겠습니다.
20025018.English_Text:
You really want to do that? Well... If that's what you want.
I'll tell you the location.
20025018.Chinese_Text:
有必要吗？不...既然你想知道，当然没什么不可以。
我来把位置告诉你。

20025020.English_Text: This is what I came for... (...)

20025021.Original_Text: 아. 시설 관리 쪽 자재 말씀이시죠?
20025021.English_Text: Ah. You mean the materials for facility management?
20025021.Chinese_Text: 啊。你说的是设施管理那边的资材吧？

20025022.Original_Text: 그게 지연되는 이야기를 전달 못 받으셨군요.\n아마 어딘가에서 전달이 끊어졌나 봅니다.
20025022.English_Text:
You must've not received the message.
It may have been lost in transit.
20025022.Chinese_Text:
原来那边没有收到送货延迟的消息。
看来消息在中间断掉了。

20025023.Original_Text: 죄송합니다만... 지금 목탄을 구할 수가 없는 상황입니다.
20025023.English_Text: I'm sorry but... We can't collect charcoal in our current situation.
20025023.Chinese_Text:
目前无法正常生产木炭。
我们会最优先处理你说的事情。

20025024.English_Text: Where do you get charcoal from?

20025025.Original_Text: 원래라면 북쪽 바닷가에 있는 나무를 이용해서 목탄을 만들었는데요.\n지금 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</> 때문에 북쪽으로 갈 수가 없습니다.
20025025.English_Text:
We used to make charcoal out of the trees from the North coast.
But we can't go north now because of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksini</>.
20025025.Chinese_Text:
我们原来都是利用北方海边的树制作木炭。
但现在由于夜鬼的出现无法去北方。

20025026.English_Text: How do you light fires, then?

20025027.Original_Text: 일단 급한 대로 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>밀림발발이</>의\n기름 먹인 풀과 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>거미</>의 진액을 공수해보려고 합니다.
20025027.English_Text:
We're looking to obtain Oil Greased Grass
from the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jungle Bulbari</> and sap from <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spiders</> for the time being.
20025027.Chinese_Text:
我们也很苦恼。我们现在计划使用
密林龇牙犬的“浸油草”以备急用。

20025028.English_Text:
Oh my, there's so much!
It must've been hard work gathering all this.
20025028.Chinese_Text:
哎哟，这么多！
带回来的时候很辛苦吧。

20025030.English_Text: I see. Still, thank you for your help.
20025030.Chinese_Text: 原来如此。不过还是很感谢你。

20025031.Original_Text: 이제 불을 피울 수 있으니\n작업 속도가 두 배... 아니 세 배는 나올 겁니다.
20025031.English_Text:
We can double... no, triple
our speed now that we can light fire.
20025031.Chinese_Text:
这样就能用草生火了，
工作速度会提升2倍...不，提升3倍。

20025033.Original_Text: 그 물건을 최우선으로 처리할 테니까요!\n걱정 마십시오.
20025033.English_Text:
We'll prioritize your package!
Don't you worry.
20025033.Chinese_Text:
我们会最优先处理那件事！
请放心。

20025034.English_Text:
If you go back and wait,
the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> will deliver it.
20025034.Chinese_Text:
请回去等待吧。桃花商廛
一定会把东西送到。

20025035.Original_Text: 오! 왔나? 물건이 도착했다네. 이젠 작업할 수 있겠어.
20025035.English_Text: You're back! The package has arrived. Now we can get back to work.
20025035.Chinese_Text: 哟！你来了？我们已经收到东西。可以开始作业了。

20025037.Original_Text: 설마 내가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에서 은퇴해서 이런 건 아니겠지?\n예전엔 제시간에 가져다주었는데 말이야...
20025037.English_Text:
This isn't because I've retired from the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>, is it?
They used to deliver things on time.
20025037.Chinese_Text:
不会是因为我从搜阳隐退才会变成这样吧？
过去一直都很准时...

20025038.Original_Text: 그런 건 아니겠지... 그래도 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에서 일을 받아서 하고 있는데\n내가 어른이니 한번은 이해해야지.
20025038.English_Text:
Perhaps not... But I'll try to be mature and understand either way,
since the<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> have work for me to do.
20025038.Chinese_Text:
应该不会是因为这个理由...我们仍然在接搜阳的工作，
我作为长辈应该体谅他们一次。

20025039.Original_Text: 옛날엔 상상도 할 수 없는 일이었어.\n그때가 좋았지. 다들 잠도 안 자고 일했어.
20025039.English_Text:
Such a thing wasn't even imaginable in the past.
Those were the days. Everyone enjoyed working so hard.
20025039.Chinese_Text:
过去根本不可能发生这种事。
那真是好时光，当时大家都昼夜不分地努力工作。

20025040.English_Text: The people of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> were decent people and hard workers...
20025040.Chinese_Text: 风白门，艾瑞达的人们不仅斯文，办事效率也很高...

20025041.Original_Text: 뭐, 이제야 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>랑 일하기로 했으니 \n옛날 이야기해봐야 의미 없지만...
20025041.English_Text: Well, it's no use talking about the past, since we've decided to work with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>.
20025041.Chinese_Text:
唉，现在跟我们合作的是四虎，
说过去的事也无济于事...

20025042.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</> 사람들과 손발을 잘 맞춰봐야지.\n시대가 바뀌었으니 내가 적응해야지. 하핫!
20025042.English_Text:
I may as well get used to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>.
Time doesn't stop for anyone, after all. Haha!
20025042.Chinese_Text:
我们需要尽量跟四虎互相配合。
既然时代改变了，我也应该跟着改变。哈哈！

20025043.Original_Text: 내가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>대원이었을 때... 그때가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>\n처음 왔을 때였나? 그랬는데 말이지.
20025043.English_Text:
When I was a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seeker</> myself... Was it when
I first came to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>? Well, way back then.
20025043.Chinese_Text:
当我还是搜阳队员时...当时应该是
第一次来到海越大陆吧？那个时候...

20025044.English_Text: I have urgent business. I'll have to listen at another time.
20025044.Chinese_Text: （表示有急事需要离开，想以后再听）

20025045.Original_Text: 그래? 그럼 나중에 술이라도 하나 사 들고 오게.\n내가 재밌는 이야기를 많이 들려주도록 하지. 하핫!
20025045.English_Text:
Is that so? Then, bring me a drink later.
I've got lots of interesting stories to tell you. Haha!
20025045.Chinese_Text:
是吗？下次来的时候带一瓶酒吧。
我一定会给你讲很多有趣的故事。哈哈！

20025046.Original_Text: 아, 그리고 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>에서 감사하다고 \n다시 한번 찾아와 달라고 부탁하더군.
20025046.English_Text:
Ah, and there was a request from the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Steel</>.
They mentioned being grateful, and they asked you to visit again.
20025046.Chinese_Text:
对了，金庚哲门说很感谢你，
请你去找他们一次。

20025047.English_Text: Welcome. What are you here for?
20025047.Chinese_Text:
你来了！上次多亏了你帮忙。
非常感谢。

20025048.Original_Text: (뭔가 곤란한 표정을 하고 계셔서요. 무슨 일이 있나요?)

20025049.Original_Text: 제가 그런 표정을 하고 있었나요?\n어휴. 그러면 안 되는데...
20025049.English_Text:
Does it really look like I feel that way?
Huff. That won't do.
20025049.Chinese_Text:
幸好权洋元先生表示了理解。
本来这是非常有失信誉的事情。

20025050.Original_Text: 지금 이런 일 저런 일들이 있어서...\n작업자들이 일을 할 수 없는 상황입니다.
20025050.English_Text:
A lot of things happened recently, so...
The workers are currently unable to get anything done.
20025050.Chinese_Text: 我们以后一定会尽力按时办事。

20025052.Original_Text: 작업 재료나 연료 구하기가 어렵고...\n조직 내부에 좀 문제가 있어서요.
20025052.English_Text:
It's difficult to collect the work materials and fuel.
There's also a problem within our organization.
20025052.Chinese_Text:
可是呢，出现这种情况之后
大家都很沮丧。

20025053.Original_Text: 이런 상황에서 어떻게 작업자들을 고무시킬지\n고민인 상황입니다.
20025053.English_Text:
I don't know how I should increase
worker morale in a situation like this.
20025053.Chinese_Text:
我不知道该如何
激励大家。

20025054.English_Text: Is there anything that can be done to help?

20025055.Original_Text: 그럼... 여기 장인들이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>거미</> 튀김이라면 완전히 미치거든요.\n그걸 좀 잡아주시면 힘이 될 것 같습니다.
20025055.English_Text:
In that case... The craftsman here are really fond of fried <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spiders</>.
It'd be really helpful if you could get us some.
20025055.Chinese_Text:
既然如此...这里的匠人们都很喜欢寄居蟹。
如果能找来一些寄居蟹，应该能提振士气。

20025062.English_Text:
Oh, wow!
You've collected a ton.
20025062.Chinese_Text:
哎哟！
竟然抓来了这么多。

20025063.English_Text: There were plenty in the forest.

20025064.Original_Text: 다행입니다. 요즘 작업자들이 아주 힘들어 해서요.
20025064.English_Text: That's a relief. The workers were really having a hard time.
20025064.Chinese_Text: 太好了。最近大家都很辛苦。

20025065.Original_Text: 저희가 직접 물건도 가져다 드리고\n사죄 인사도 드리면 좋겠는데 말이죠.
20025065.English_Text:
I'd like to bring them the goods
and apologize while I'm at it.
20025065.Chinese_Text:
如果能把这种情况直接告诉
权洋元先生该有多好...

20025066.English_Text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> told us
to come to them for anything related to deliveries.
20025066.Chinese_Text:
桃花商廛说如果出现问题
就要告诉他们。

20025067.Original_Text: (바로 옆인데 그냥 말하면 되는 거 아니냐고 한다)
20025067.English_Text: Why can't you simply ask? You're standing right next to each other.
20025067.Chinese_Text: （问他们就在附近，直接过去说不好吗）

20025068.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>과의 관계가 있으니까\n그걸 깨고 직접 연락을 주고받기가 애매해서요.
20025068.English_Text:
We have a specifically defined relationship with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>.
It's hard to make direct contact without breaking that.
20025068.Chinese_Text:
由于与桃花商廛的关系，
不方便直接进行联系。

20025069.English_Text: It seems strange and rather inefficient.
20025069.Chinese_Text: （表示有些奇怪也很没有效率）

20025070.Original_Text: 저희도 그렇게... 흠흠.\n뭐 어쨌든 재료도 문제고... 도구도 문제고...
20025070.English_Text:
We also think the same... Ahem.
Well, the materials... and the tools are a problem...
20025070.Chinese_Text:
我们也这么想...唔。
总之，材料是个问题...工具也是...

20025071.Original_Text: 일 처리도 복잡하고... 기운이 빠지네요.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>분들이 좀 정리해주시면 좋겠는데 말이죠.
20025071.English_Text:
The job is complicated... and it's pretty disheartening.
It'd be helpful if the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> dealt with it.
20025071.Chinese_Text:
处理事情也很复杂...真让人丧气。
希望四虎他们能梳理一下情况。

20025073.Chinese_Text: 你...是不是来自水月平原？

20025075.English_Text: I see. Now, did you pay the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>?
20025075.Chinese_Text: 原来如此。是不是给四虎交了钱？

20025076.Original_Text: 저도 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>에 오면 대박이라고...\n무조건 남는 장사라고 해서요.
20025076.English_Text:
I was also told by the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> that <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</> was a sure-fire bet that would be profitable...
There'd be no way I'd lose money there.
20025076.Chinese_Text:
我也是听四虎说来海越大陆就能大赚一笔...
而且是稳赚不赔。

20025077.Original_Text: 얼마 내셨어요? 저는 있는 거 없는 거 그냥 다 긁었는데...
20025077.English_Text: How much did you pay? I gave every coin I could find...
20025077.Chinese_Text: 你交了多少钱？我可是把所有的钱都交了出去...

20025078.Original_Text: 엄청나게 내셨구나? 당하셨네. 당하셨어!\n그쪽 말고도 당한 사람이 많아요.
20025078.English_Text:
You paid a lot, didn't you? You were scammed, too!
There are a lot of people like us.
20025078.Chinese_Text:
你叫了那么多？被坑了，被坑了呀！
不光是你，还有很多人都吃了亏。

20025079.Original_Text: 담당자를 만나서 좀 따져봐야 하는데...\n바쁘다고 제대로 응대를 해주지 않아서요.
20025079.English_Text:
I need to meet the Manager to file a complaint...
But they won't respond to me properly, always dodging and saying they're busy.
20025079.Chinese_Text:
我们想找负责人追究一下...
但对方总是借口很忙不答复我们。

20025081.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>의 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>박대비</>라는 사람인데요.\n가서 왜 이야기를 안 들어주냐고 좀 물어봐 주세요.
20025081.English_Text:
It's someone by the name of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Park Devon</> at the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>.
Please go and ask why he won't listen to me.
20025081.Chinese_Text:
负责人是桃花商廛的朴防备。
请帮我们问一下为什么不理会我们。

20025082.Original_Text: 물건 보러 오셨어요? 제가 지금은 좀 바쁜데...\n급한 거 아니면 다음에 어떠세요?
20025082.English_Text:
Did you come here for the product? I'm a little busy right now...
How about next time, if it's not so urgent?
20025082.Chinese_Text:
你来看商品？我现在有点忙...
如果不是急事的话，可以下次再聊吗？

20025084.Original_Text: 아... 그거요? 그거는 애초에 설명서에 다 적힌 내용인데\n그걸 인제 와서 따지면 어떻게 합니까?
20025084.English_Text:
Ah... That? That was all written in the manual.
Why are you complaining about that after all this time?
20025084.Chinese_Text:
啊...那件事？那都是当初写进说明书的事情。
现在来计较又有什么用？

20025085.Chinese_Text: （让对方冷静一下，然后慢慢说）

20025086.Original_Text: 전 진정된 상태에요. 뭘 진정하라 그래요?\n아니 내가 뭐 강제로 오라고 했어요?
20025086.English_Text:
I'm perfectly calm. Who are you to tell me to settle down?
Did I force you to come here?
20025086.Chinese_Text:
我现在非常冷静。你还让我冷静？
我有没有强迫他们来。

20025087.Original_Text: 바빠 죽겠는데... 별 이상한 소릴 다 듣겠네.
20025087.English_Text: I can't believe I'm listening to this nonsense when I'm so insanely busy.
20025087.Chinese_Text: 我现在很忙...没空听你瞎说。

20025089.Original_Text: 여긴 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>이라구요. 그것도 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙 예도항</>.\n여기저기서 주문이 들어와서 처리하느라 정신이 없어요.
20025089.English_Text:
We are the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>. And this is <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port at Haewol</>.
I'm busy with all the orders coming in from all over the place.
20025089.Chinese_Text:
这里可是桃花商廛。而且是海越大陆誉导港。
我们忙着处理各地订单，没空理其他事情。

20025090.English_Text: Will you be able to talk if I help you with anything?
20025090.Chinese_Text:
（问如果自己帮忙，
是否可以抽出时间聊一下）

20025091.English_Text:
Fine, then! Go and get me some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bear Skins</>.
They all have to be freshly skinned.
20025091.Chinese_Text:
当然！可以找来10捆新鲜的蜘蛛丝吗？
刚采集的蜘蛛丝？

20025093.Original_Text: 오! 감사합니다. 이걸로 급한 불은 좀 끄겠네요.
20025093.English_Text: Thank you very much. This should help take care of the urgent orders.
20025093.Chinese_Text: 喔！非常感谢。这样就能解燃眉之急了。

20025094.English_Text: Do you have time to talk now?

20025095.English_Text:
Yes, I do. And I apologize for earlier.
I've been stretched thin lately.
20025095.Chinese_Text:
是。刚才失礼了。
最近实在是太忙。

20025096.English_Text: Let me tell you about <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lee Samin</>... (...)

20025097.Original_Text: 아. 그렇군요. 제가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>이사민</> 씨를 만나서 이야기해볼게요.\n아마 오해가 있었던 것 같습니다.
20025097.English_Text:
I see. I will meet Mr. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lee Samin</> and talk with him.
There seems to be a misunderstanding.
20025097.Chinese_Text:
啊，原来如此。我会跟李迁民面对面交谈。
我想肯定是有一些误会。

20025098.Original_Text: 이주 비용에 뱃삯이 포함되어 있기도 하고요.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>가 사람들을 이주시키기 위해 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에 엄청난 돈을 내고 있거든요.
20025098.English_Text:
The cost of relocation also included the boat fare.
Also, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> are paying huge sums of money to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> to relocate people.
20025098.Chinese_Text:
移居费用包括船费。
而且四虎为了帮助人们移居向搜阳提供着庞大的资金。

20025099.Original_Text: 그래서 아마 가격이 높다고 생각하실 것 같습니다.\n실제로 들어가는 비용 등을 설명해 드려야겠네요.
20025099.English_Text:
That's probably why he thought it was too expensive.
I should explain to him all the costs included.
20025099.Chinese_Text:
所以人们才会觉得价格过高。
看来我需要向他们解释一下实际需要的费用等。

20025101.Original_Text: 예. 물론입니다. 이번에는 차분히 말씀 듣겠습니다.
20025101.English_Text: Yes. Of course. I will inform him calmly this time.
20025101.Chinese_Text: 那就麻烦你了。这次我一定会仔细说明给他。

20025103.Original_Text: 그래요? 가서 설명을 들어봐야겠네요.\n해결은 어려울 수도 있겠지만요.
20025103.English_Text:
Is that right? I should go and listen to his explanation.
It might not be much of a solution, though.
20025103.Chinese_Text:
是吗？那我去听一下解释吧。
虽然可能很难解决问题。

20025104.Original_Text: 저도 뭐 딱히 뭘 받아내겠다는 건 아니고요.\n좀 답답한 마음에 찾아갔는데...
20025104.English_Text:
It's not that I want to get something out of it.
I just visited him out of frustration...
20025104.Chinese_Text:
我也不是非要得到什么。
我只是觉得有些抑郁才去找他们...

20025105.Original_Text: 이야기는 안 들어주고... 설명서나 읽어보라고 해서\n좀 서운한 기분이 들더라고요.
20025105.English_Text:
They wouldn't listen to me. They kept telling me to read the manual,
and that got me riled up.
20025105.Chinese_Text:
可他们却不听我说话...只是让我读说明书，
所以感觉有些遗憾。

20025106.Original_Text: (혹시 나중에 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>를 만나면 이런 상황을 전달하겠다고 한다)
20025106.English_Text: I'll tell the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> what happened if I happen to meet them later.
20025106.Chinese_Text: （表示以后遇到四虎的话一定会转告这种情况）

20025107.Original_Text: 그렇게 해주시면 좋죠. 근데... 결국은 제가 잘해야죠.\n사실 답답해서 누가 제 이야기를 들어주길 바랐던 것 같아요.
20025107.English_Text:
I'd be very grateful if you did. In the end, though, I should take care of myself.
I think I was just frustrated and wanted someone to listen to me.
20025107.Chinese_Text:
那样当然再好不过。但是...最重要的还是我自己努力。
我可能只是需要有人倾听而已。

20025108.Original_Text: 여기 환경도 별로고 물가 비싸긴 한데...\n반대로 일자리도 많고 임금도 높거든요.
20025108.English_Text:
The environment here isn't exactly appealing, and everything is so expensive...
On the other hand, there're lots of jobs, and the wages are high.
20025108.Chinese_Text:
这里的环境不佳，物价很高...
但工作机会很多，薪水也很高。

20025109.Original_Text: 그래서 열심히만 하면 어떻게든 될 것 같아요.\n열심히 벌어서 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>반달호수</>에 있는 가족들 부양해야죠!
20025109.English_Text:
So, I believe I can get by if I do my best.
I have to work hard and support my family at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sapphire Basin</>!
20025109.Chinese_Text:
所以只要努力就一定能找到办法。
我一定要努力赚钱抚养半月湖的家人！

20025110.Original_Text: 여기서 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>전도유망한 청년</>을 하나 만났습니다.\n같이 사업을 시작할 생각이에요.
20025110.English_Text:
I met a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>promising young woman</> here.
We plan to start a business together.
20025110.Chinese_Text:
我在这里遇到了一个前途无量的青年。
我们准备一起创业。

20025111.English_Text: Good to know. I hope it works out.

20025112.Original_Text: 정말이십니까? 혹시 괜찮으시면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>그 청년</>을 만나서\n이야기 한번 들어봐 주시겠어요? 도움이 될 것 같은데...
20025112.English_Text:
Thank you. If you don't mind, could you meet that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>young talent</>
and listen to her a bit? It might help...
20025112.Chinese_Text:
如果方便的话，可以与那个青年
交谈一下吗？

20025113.Original_Text: (왜 날 뚫어지게 쳐다보는 걸까?\n얼굴에 뭔가 묻은 걸까?)
20025113.English_Text:
(Why are they gawking at you?
Do you have something on your face?)
20025113.Chinese_Text: （他就是李迁民说的那个青年？）

20025114.English_Text: Can you... see it? My boundless passion and potential?
20025114.Chinese_Text: 你能...看到吗？我的热情与潜力？

20025116.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>에는 다른 곳에는 구할 수 없는 \n특! 별! 한! 무언가가 있다!
20025116.English_Text:
Well, there's something extraordinary about me,
something you won't find in all of <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>!
20025116.Chinese_Text:
海越大陆上有在其他地方无法找到的
特！别！的！某种东西！

20025117.English_Text:
I believe in it.
I'm going to develop that potential.
20025117.Chinese_Text:
我坚信如此。
我准备开发那个东西。

20025119.Original_Text: 아니... 가시지 말고요.\n제 이야기 좀 더 들어 주세요.
20025119.English_Text:
No... Don't go.
Just listen a bit more to what I have to say.
20025119.Chinese_Text:
别...别走呀。
请继续听我说。

20025120.Original_Text: 저기 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>녹색 뿔의 숲</>에 있는 단단한 식물이 있거든요.\n그걸로 바구니를 만들어 보고 싶어요.
20025120.English_Text:
There's a Strong Plant inside the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Greenhorn Woods</>.
I want to make a basket out of it.
20025120.Chinese_Text:
那个绿角森林里有一种坚硬的植物。
我想用它制作篮子。

20025122.Original_Text: 아니... 그게요. 주변의 괴물 때문에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>줄기</>를 얻을 수가 없어서요.\n그걸 좀 얻어주시면 안 될까요?
20025122.English_Text:
Wait, I... Well, I can't get my hands on those <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>stems</> because of the monsters in that area.
Do you think you could get me some?
20025122.Chinese_Text:
但是...有个问题。周围怪物太多，无法获得植物茎。
可以帮忙找来一些植物茎吗？

20025123.English_Text: Is this it? I'll check it right away.
20025123.Chinese_Text: 就是这些吗？请让我稍微确认一下。

20025124.Original_Text: 음... 오! 좋아요. 이 강도와 유연성!\n이걸로 바구니를 만들면?
20025124.English_Text:
Hmm... This is great. This strength, this flexibility!
What if I make a basket with this, you ask?
20025124.Chinese_Text:
唔...喔！很好。这个强度与柔韧性！
如果有这些植物茎制作篮子的话？

20025125.English_Text: It will become a signature product of <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haywol of Haewol</>, naturally!
20025125.Chinese_Text: 肯定会成为海越大陆的特产。

20025126.English_Text: What advantages are there to your basket?

20025127.English_Text: I'll be finding that out from now on.
20025127.Chinese_Text:
我以后会慢慢研究。
肯定会有什么特别的部分。

20025129.Original_Text: 아! 드디어 뵙습니다. 절 도와주셨던 소협 맞으시죠?
20025129.English_Text: Ah! It's good to finally meet you. You must be the one who helped me before, right?
20025129.Chinese_Text: 啊！我想起来了。你就是上次帮助我的大侠吧？

20025130.English_Text: I was very... frustrated back then...

20025131.English_Text:
Ah! I heard about you from <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shin Haywol</>.
You helped her get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>stem</> materials for her basket.
20025131.Chinese_Text:
啊！海月告诉我了。
听说你帮忙找来了制作篮子的材料。

20025132.Original_Text: 그렇게 만든 바구니가\n평이 아주 좋아요! 난리가 났습니다.
20025132.English_Text:
The basket we made with it
got really positive feedback! It's a real hot item right now.
20025132.Chinese_Text:
我利用那些材料制作了篮子。
结果好评如潮！消费者的反响非常强烈。

20025133.Chinese_Text: （表示感慨，没想到会变成这样）

20025134.Original_Text: 근데 문제가 생겼습니다. 그 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>줄기</>도 나라의 소유물이라고...\n함부로 개발하면 안 된다고 합니다.
20025134.English_Text:
But... there's a problem. Apparently, the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>plant</> is protected by the government...
We're not allowed to harvest it without permission.
20025134.Chinese_Text:
不过出现了一个问题。那种植物茎也是国家所有的东西...
听说不能随意开发。

20025136.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에서요. 허가 없이 장사하면 안된다고 했어요.\n혹시 이것 관련해서 한번 알아봐 주시면 안 될까요?
20025136.English_Text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> said I can't sell it without permission.
Could you look into this matter for me?
20025136.Chinese_Text:
搜阳。他们说不能在没有许可的情况下做这方面的生意。
可以请你帮忙了解一下这方面的事情吗？

20025137.Original_Text: 엄밀하게 말하자면 틀린 말은 아니야.\n보통은 거기까지 제약을 걸지 않지만...
20025137.English_Text:
Strictly speaking, it's not false.
However, usually they don't put any restrictions...
20025137.Chinese_Text:
严格地来讲，那样做没有错。
虽然一般不会管得那么细...

20025138.English_Text: Is there any other way around?

20025139.Original_Text: 그럼 내가 방법이 없을지 확인해보겠네.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 사람과 논의를 해보면 방법이 있을 거야.
20025139.English_Text:
Then, I'll check if there's something else I can try.
There might be a way if we negotiate with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
20025139.Chinese_Text:
我来看一下有没有什么办法。
跟搜阳那边的人商量的话，肯定能找到办法。

20025140.Original_Text: 근데 그 바구니라는 게 그렇게 대단한 건가?
20025140.English_Text: But is this basket really as great as they say it is?
20025140.Chinese_Text: 不过那个篮子真的有那么了不得吗？

20025142.Original_Text: 그럼 제작자에게 가서 견본을 하나 만들어 달라고 해서 가져오게.
20025142.English_Text: Then, have the creator make one and deliver it to us.
20025142.Chinese_Text: 那么去找生产者制作一个样品带回来给我看吧。

20025143.English_Text: I'll go to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> and make a deal with them.
20025143.Chinese_Text: 我会跟搜阳的人进行谈判。

20025144.Original_Text: 견본이요? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>인가 그 사람이 해결해 줄 수 있나요?
20025144.English_Text: A sample? Will this <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</> person be able to solve this problem for us?
20025144.Chinese_Text: 样品吗？郭浩龙那个人能帮我解决这个问题吗？

20025145.Original_Text: (그래도 가장 믿을 수 있는 사람이라고 한다)
20025145.Chinese_Text: （表示他是最值得信赖的一个人）

20025146.Original_Text: 알겠습니다. 잠시만 기다려주세요.\n이게 대충 뚝딱해서 나오는 게 아니라서요.
20025146.English_Text:
I understand. Please wait a moment.
This isn't something that can be accomplished with the snap of a finger.
20025146.Chinese_Text:
明白了。请稍等一下。
这不是随便就能做出来的东西。

20025148.English_Text:
I need only ready my heart.
I must draw out that artistic part of me.
20025148.Chinese_Text:
我需要一点心理准备。
应该说需要一点艺术之魂吧？

20025150.Original_Text: 음... 지금 바로 받아 가실 예정이신가요?\n음... 잠시만요... 바로 만들어 볼게요!
20025150.English_Text:
Hm... Are you going to take one right away?
Hmm... Wait a moment... I'll make one immediately!
20025150.Chinese_Text:
唔...现在就要吗？
那么...就给你这个！

20025151.Original_Text: 완성했어요.\n오! 제가 봐도 잘 만들었네요! 걸작입니다!
20025151.English_Text:
I'm done.
Wow! Even I can tell it's well made! It's a masterpiece!
20025151.Chinese_Text: 这是3天前制作的...我自己也觉得质量上乘。

20025152.Original_Text: 이건가? 음... 좋구먼. 팔리겠어.\n가볍고 촉감이 좋아. 색칠 안 해도 기본색이 좋고...
20025152.English_Text:
Is this it? Hm. It's fine quality, so it'll sell.
It's light, and its finish is appealing. The base color is lovely, even without any dye...
20025152.Chinese_Text:
这就是传闻中的篮子？嗯...不错，看来确实很好卖。
不仅轻，触感也不错。底色优秀，也不需要上色...

20025153.Original_Text: 원가가 어떻게 나오려나. 양은 충분히 나올까?\n얼마에 팔까? 채산성이...
20025153.English_Text:
How much does it cost to make? Is there enough in supply?
How much can it sell for? Is it profitable...?
20025153.Chinese_Text:
不知道成本如何？产量是否足够？
售价呢？收益性...

20025154.English_Text: Oh! I should tell you about <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lee Samin</>. (...)
20025154.Chinese_Text: （表示突然想起了一件事，把李迁民的事告诉他）

20025155.Original_Text: 그래? 그랬구만... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>담당자</>가 성실하긴 한데... \n융통성이 없는 녀석이야.
20025155.English_Text:
Is that so... That <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Manager</> is diligent and hardworking...
But he's too inflexible when it comes to the rules.
20025155.Chinese_Text:
是吗？原来如此...负责人很兢兢业业...
但比较死板。

20025156.Original_Text: 큰 사업과 작은 장사의 차이를 몰라서 그래.\n신뢰의 가치를 너무 낮게 잡아서 그런 거겠지.
20025156.English_Text:
That's because he has trouble seeing the bigger picture sometimes.
He doesn't value trust as much as he should.
20025156.Chinese_Text:
他不太明白大事业与小生意的区别。
他把信赖的价值看得太低。

20025157.Original_Text: 장부에 적자 나는 꼴을 못 볼 거야. 이익을 따지겠지.
20025157.English_Text: He probably can't stand seeing a deficit in the ledger. He'll always be chasing after profit.
20025157.Chinese_Text: 他无法忍受账簿出现赤字。很重视利益。

20025158.Original_Text: 더 큰 의도를 이해해주면 좋겠는데...\n내가 다시 한번 설명하겠네.
20025158.English_Text:
I really do hope he can broaden his perspective a bit...
I'll explain this to him again.
20025158.Chinese_Text:
真希望他看得更远...
我会再说明一次。

20025159.Original_Text: 이주 가격도 다시 검토하고, \n와서 적응을 도울 방법도 찾아봄세.
20025159.English_Text:
I'll re-evaluate the relocation costs
and look for other ways to help this get adapted.
20025159.Chinese_Text:
我们会重新制订移居价格，
同时寻求帮助人们定居的办法。

20025160.English_Text: Thank you for listening to me.

20025161.Original_Text: 어찌 되었든 바구니는 내가 처리할 테니 걱정하지 말게.
20025161.English_Text: Don't you worry, I'll solve this basket problem no matter what.
20025161.Chinese_Text: 不管怎样，我会处理篮子的事情，不要担心。

20025162.English_Text:
You're here! Thank you.
I heard about it just now.
20025162.Chinese_Text:
你来了！非常感谢。
我刚刚收到了消息。

20025164.Original_Text: 예, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에서 매출액의 일정 비율을 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에 기부하는 조건으로 \n상업적으로 이용해도 좋다고 허가받았습니다.
20025164.English_Text:
Yes, I've received authorization on the condition that
I pay a commission to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
20025164.Chinese_Text:
是，搜阳提出的条件是把销售额的10%捐款给搜阳，
这样我们就能进行与篮子有关的商业活动。

20025165.English_Text: It was resolved faster that I thought.
20025165.Chinese_Text: （表示事情处理得比预想中更快）

20025166.English_Text: This <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</> person you know must've done his best to help.
20025166.Chinese_Text: 看来郭浩龙起到了很大帮助。

20025167.Chinese_Text: （把自己遇到郭浩龙的事情告诉他）

20025168.Original_Text: 그렇군요. 전 이번에 도움도 받았고 이제 괜찮습니다.\n이후에 오시는 분들에게 도움이 되면 좋겠네요.
20025168.English_Text:
I see. I was able to be receive help this time, and everything worked out.
I do hope this precedent will help the people who come after me.
20025168.Chinese_Text:
原来如此。我这次受到了帮助，现在心情也好多了。
希望以后来到这里的人们也能得到帮助。

20025169.English_Text: (Huh? The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom</> seem to be very serious.)
20025169.Chinese_Text: （嗯？梅花团那些人的气氛很沉重）

20025172.Original_Text: 아! 소협. \n제 이야기를 한번 들어봐 주십시오.
20025172.English_Text:
Ah! It's you.
Please hear me out.
20025172.Chinese_Text:
啊！大侠。
请听我一言。

20025173.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>에서 뭘 하려면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>과 협력할 때가 많은데...\n거기 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>대원들</>이 이상해서 같이 일을 못 하겠어요.
20025173.English_Text:
In <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>, there are many occasions where we have to cooperate with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>...
But some of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>members</> there are so intolerable, it's impossible to get anything done with them.
20025173.Chinese_Text:
若想在海越大陆做点什么，一般都要与搜阳合作...
可是搜阳的队员们有问题，实在难以一起做事。

20025174.Original_Text: 그냥 입만 열면 지 자랑이야. 뭐도 하지 마. 이것 안된다.\n같이 일하는 내내 잔소리란 잔소리는...
20025174.English_Text:
Whenever they open their mouths, they're just barking orders. Don't do this, don't do that.
They keep nagging us the entire time we work together...
20025174.Chinese_Text:
他们只要一开口就是自我炫耀。而且对我们总是这也不行，那也不行。
一起做事的时候唠叨个没完没了...

20025175.Original_Text: 어휴. 자기들이 여기 와서 힘든 거 다했다고 생색은 아주 그냥...
20025175.English_Text: They keep bragging non-stop about all the hard work they did when they came here...
20025175.Chinese_Text: 唉。他们仗着自己的苦劳最大，总是自视甚高...

20025177.Original_Text: 진정 못 합니다! 이래선 더 이상 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이랑 일 못 합니다!
20025177.English_Text: I can't calm down! I can't possibly work with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> like this!
20025177.Chinese_Text: 我冷静不下来！这样下去没办法跟搜阳继续做事！

20025178.English_Text: (I came here... But I don't know what to say.)
20025178.Chinese_Text: （虽然来到了这里...但不知道该怎么开口）

20025179.Original_Text: (들은 대로 말하면 싸움을 부추기는 꼴이 될 것 같은데...)
20025179.English_Text: (If I relay what I heard, I might as well be encouraging a fight.)
20025179.Chinese_Text: （感觉如果实话实说只会煽风点火...）

20025180.Original_Text: (일단 근처로 가서 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>대원들</>의 이야기를 좀 엿들어 볼까?)
20025180.English_Text: (Maybe I should go closer and listen to what the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>members</> have to say?)
20025180.Chinese_Text: （先去附近偷听一下队员们的想法吧？）

20025181.English_Text: Is there something I can help you with?

20025182.Original_Text: 아니... 이런 거 말하면 뒷말하는 것 같아서 좀 별론데...
20025182.English_Text: It's just... I don't feel good about this. It feels like I'm talking behind their backs...
20025182.Chinese_Text: 没什么...我不想在背后说闲话...

20025183.English_Text: In that case, I'll pretend I didn't hear anything...

20025184.Original_Text: 들어 봐. 그러니까 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</> 사람들이랑 일하는데...\n익숙하지 않으니까 주의사항도 좀 알려주고 그랬단 말이야.
20025184.English_Text:
All right, listen. So, I was working with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>...
I let them know a few things they should look out for, since they're new to this.
20025184.Chinese_Text:
你听我说。我们跟四虎那些人一起做事...
因为他们不熟悉情况，所以我告诉了他们一些注意事项。

20025185.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>고 담당자님</>, 그런 거 잘하시잖습니까.\n사람들 지적하고 친절히 알려주시는 거.
20025185.English_Text:
That's just like you, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Manager</>. You're good at that.
Pointing out problems and kindly informing people about them.
20025185.Chinese_Text:
古负责人，您不是很善于
亲切地指点别人吗？

20025186.Original_Text: 그치. 맞아. 지금이야 안전하다지만\n예전에 거기 개척하면서 죽은 게 한둘이야?
20025186.English_Text:
Yeah. That's me. Anyway, it's safe now,
but many people died trying to explore that place.
20025186.Chinese_Text:
没错。现在虽然很安全，
但过去开拓那里的时候可没少死人。

20025187.Original_Text: 병에 걸려도 죽고, 지쳐서 죽고, 음식 상해서 죽고 말이야.
20025187.English_Text: They fell victim to disease, fatigue, and food poisoning.
20025187.Chinese_Text: 病死，累死，吃坏东西死掉等等。

20025188.English_Text: Did people really die from spoiled food?
20025188.Chinese_Text: 还有人吃坏东西死了吗？

20025189.Original_Text: 많은 영향을 줬지. 먹는 게 아주 중요하거든. \n전투력에 직결되는 거야.
20025189.English_Text:
Food is very important.
It's directly connected to combat power.
20025189.Chinese_Text:
当然影响很大。吃是很重要的问题。
这直接关系到战斗力。

20025190.Original_Text: 맞습니다. 음식은 전투력이라고 해도 과언이 아니죠.
20025190.English_Text: That's right. You could say fighting well begins with eating well.
20025190.Chinese_Text: 没错。食物等同于战斗力，一点都不夸张。

20025191.Original_Text: 근데 무슨 잔소리 듣는 것처럼 불쾌한 얼굴을 해가지고...
20025191.English_Text: They always made these faces... as if they thought I was nagging them...
20025191.Chinese_Text: 可是他们却嫌我唠叨，一脸不高兴...

20025192.Original_Text: 아휴. 좋은 말씀 전하려고 하신 건데...\n마음 상하셨겠습니다.
20025192.English_Text:
You were just trying to help them...
It must've been upsetting.
20025192.Chinese_Text:
唉。您只是好心劝告他们而已...
真是不知好意。

20025193.Original_Text: 그래서 감정이 좀 격앙되면서 소리가 좀 커지긴 했어.\n그건 내가 잘못했지.
20025193.English_Text:
I think I did get a little heated and raised my voice a little.
That's my fault.
20025193.Chinese_Text:
所以我有些激动，说话声音也高了。
这是我的错。

20025194.Original_Text: 그래도 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>그 사람들</>에게 도움이 되었으면 좋겠다 싶어서...\n아휴... 다음엔 내가 더 신경 써야겠다. 조심해야지.
20025194.English_Text:
But all I wanted was to help <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>those people</>...
I should handle things more delicately next time.
20025194.Chinese_Text:
我还是希望能够帮到那些人...
唉...下次我说话时再注意一点吧。

20025196.Original_Text: 그래요? 과거에 동료들이 죽은 걸 경험했으니...\n우리들이 너무 가볍게 생각한다고 생각했나 봐요.
20025196.English_Text:
Really? He experienced his comrades' deaths in the past...
He must've thought we didn't take it seriously enough.
20025196.Chinese_Text:
是吗？没想到在过去经历过同伴的死亡...
看来他觉得我们想得太简单了。

20025197.Original_Text: 좀 과한 면이 없진 않지만... 사정을 들으니\n이해가 가지 않는 것도 아니네요.
20025197.English_Text:
He may have overreacted at times... But now
that I know his story, I can understand.
20025197.Chinese_Text:
虽然他的态度有些过分...但听到这些事情之后
也不是不能理解。

20025198.English_Text: He didn't seem like a bad person.

20025199.Original_Text: 나쁜 사람은 아니겠죠. 그런 생각이 있었다고 하니\n저도 오해한 부분이 있는 것 같습니다.
20025199.English_Text:
He's probably not a bad person. Now that I understand him,
I think I had my misunderstandings, too.
20025199.Chinese_Text:
我想也是。了解到对方的想法之后，
我也觉得自己误会了对方。

20025200.Original_Text: 다음번에 만날 때는 좀 잘 풀어봐야겠네요.
20025200.English_Text: I should try to talk with him and clear up these misunderstandings next time.
20025200.Chinese_Text: 下次见面时一定要好好消除误会。

20025202.English_Text: Oh, and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</> of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> was looking for you, so you should pay him a visit.
20025202.Chinese_Text: 对了，桃花商廛的郭浩龙找你，去看看吧。

20025205.Original_Text: 최근에 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>과 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</> 휘하의 대원들 사이의 충돌에 대해 들었는데.\n자네가 중재에 나서 주었다고?
20025205.English_Text:
I heard there was trouble between the members of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> and the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
And you mediated between the two?
20025205.Chinese_Text:
我听说了最近搜阳与四虎队员们之间发生的矛盾。
是你在中间调解的吗？

20025206.Original_Text: (중재에 나선 건 아니고 이야기만 전달했다고 한다)
20025206.English_Text: I didn't mediate. I simply delivered what each party had to say.
20025206.Chinese_Text: （表示说不上调解，只是帮忙转达了一些事情而已）

20025207.Original_Text: 그래, 나도 이야기를 들었고... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 쪽에 가서 의사 전달도 했네.
20025207.English_Text: Yes, and I heard that, too... I also relayed our opinion personally to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
20025207.Chinese_Text: 好吧。我听说了内容...也已经去搜阳那边表达了自己的想法。

20025208.Original_Text: 근데 잘못하면 감정이 상할 수도 있겠더란 말일세.
20025208.English_Text: But it could've led to heated arguing if things went wrong.
20025208.Chinese_Text: 但问题在于一不小心就会伤及感情。

20025209.Original_Text: 위에서 사이좋게 지내란 명령을 내려받는 입장이 되면\n뭔가 개운하지 않지 않겠나?
20025209.English_Text:
Wouldn't you feel uncomfortable
if you received orders to get along from your superiors?
20025209.Chinese_Text:
如果上级下达友好相处的命令，
下面的人始终会觉得心里不舒服吧？

20025211.Original_Text: 그래서 간단히 연회라도 열어서 사람들의 마음을 부드럽게 하고\n그 뒤에 이야기를 꺼낼까 싶네.
20025211.English_Text:
So, I'm thinking of holding a little feast and easing tensions
before discussing this later.
20025211.Chinese_Text:
所以我想先举办一个小宴会缓解大家的紧张气氛，
然后再把事情放到台面上。

20025212.English_Text: I'd like for you to help with the preparations.
20025212.Chinese_Text: 希望你能够帮忙准备宴会。

20025213.English_Text: This is the situation... (...) Can you come?
20025213.Chinese_Text: （说明情况，邀请对方参加宴会）

20025214.English_Text: The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> must have done something.

20025215.Original_Text: 찬성입니다. 이런 식으로 부드럽게 조율도 할 필요가 있지요.
20025215.English_Text: I agree. We do need to relax a little from time to time.
20025215.Chinese_Text: 我赞成。有必要通过这种方式友好地进行调节。

20025216.Original_Text: 제가 직접 참여하진 않아도 될 것 같고,
20025216.English_Text: I don't think I need to attend in person,
20025216.Chinese_Text: 看来我也不需要直接参与，

20025217.English_Text: Will it be okay if I send <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hayeon</> in my place?
20025217.Chinese_Text: 送河渊过去应该就可以吧？

20025219.English_Text: This is the situation... (...) Can you come?
20025219.Chinese_Text: （说明情况，邀请对方参加宴会）

20025220.Original_Text: 응? 지금 나보고 병풍 역할 하라는 거야?
20025220.English_Text: Huh? You want me to do absolutely nothing?

20025221.Original_Text: 사실 우리 없어도 전혀 상관없는 행사인 것 같긴 한데...
20025221.English_Text: It seems like an event that's totally unrelated to us.
20025221.Chinese_Text: 我觉得我们没必要参加这种宴会...

20025222.Original_Text: 그냥 적당히 와서 급을 좀 맞춰달라 이거 아니야?
20025222.English_Text: Are you asking us to come so we can bring some legitimacy to this occasion?
20025222.Chinese_Text: 只是让我们去捧一下场吧？

20025223.Original_Text: (어떻게 답을 해야 할지 몰라서 가만히 듣고 있다)
20025223.English_Text: (I should stand still as I don't know how to answer.)
20025223.Chinese_Text: （不知道该如何回答，只是静静等待）

20025224.Original_Text: 알았어... 나도 그렇게 눈치 없는 사람 아니니까.
20025224.English_Text: All right. I'm not completely tactless.
20025224.Chinese_Text: 明白了。我也不是那么不明事理。

20025225.Original_Text: 우리 쪽에선 날 대리해서 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>강철주먹</>이 갈 건데, 괜찮지?
20025225.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steel Fist</> will go in my place, is that all right?
20025225.Chinese_Text: 我们这边将由铁拳作为我的代理人参加宴会。

20025226.English_Text: This is the situation... (...) Can you come?
20025226.Chinese_Text: （说明情况，邀请对方参加宴会）

20025227.English_Text:
Okay.
I need to report and verify this...
20025227.Chinese_Text:
我知道了。
虽然还需要向上头报告并得到同意...

20025228.English_Text: But if it's an invitation from <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</>, there shouldn't be any problem.
20025228.Chinese_Text: 但既然是郭浩龙大人的邀请，应该不会有问题。

20025229.Original_Text: 장소와 시간은 확인하였고, \n혹시 문제가 있으면 따로 말씀드리겠습니다.
20025229.English_Text:
I've checked the location and time, so
I'll contact you again if there's an issue.
20025229.Chinese_Text:
我已经确认了场所与时间，
如果有问题的话，我会另行告知。

20025230.English_Text: I appreciate your hard work preparing this.

20025231.Original_Text: 사람들을 배불리 먹이고 기분 좋게 한 이후에...\n민감한 이야기를 풀어봐야겠네.
20025231.English_Text:
After I feed everyone and make them happy...
I can finally bring up this sensitive topic.
20025231.Chinese_Text:
当人们酒足饭饱心情变好之后...
再来解决一下敏感问题吧。

20025232.Original_Text: 모두 다 좋은 사람들이야.\n결국은 잘 풀리게 되겠지.
20025232.English_Text:
They are all good people.
It'll all work out well eventually.
20025232.Chinese_Text:
大家都是好人。
一定能谈好。

20025234.Original_Text: 그리고 말이야... 하나 더 부탁하고 싶은 게 있네.
20025234.English_Text: And one other thing... I'd like to ask you for one more favor.
20025234.Chinese_Text: 除此之外...我还想拜托一件事。

20025235.Original_Text: 나를 포함해 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>가 현재 현장을 돌아볼 여유가 부족하다네.
20025235.English_Text: The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> and I don't have the time to keep our eyes on the field.
20025235.Chinese_Text: 包括我在内的四虎现在没有余力查看现场。

20025236.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>태록림</>에서 일어나는 일에 대해 \n제대로 파악하지 못하고 있어 불안한 부분도 있지.
20025236.English_Text:
I can't check on what's happened at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Taero Forest</>,
and that's been worrying me.
20025236.Chinese_Text:
我们无法准确了解泰绿林内发生的事情，
因此总有一些不安。

20025237.Original_Text: 물론 내가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>과 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</> 조직을 통해 \n알아보는 부분도 늘려나가야겠지만
20025237.English_Text:
Of course, I'm going to do what I can to get more info
through the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> and the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> organization,
20025237.Chinese_Text:
当然，我也需要更多地通过桃花商廛与四虎组织
了解情况。

20025238.Original_Text: 자네가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>태록림</>이나 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>를 탐험하며 알게 되는 것을\n나한테 좀 알려주면 좋겠네.
20025238.English_Text:
but I'd also like for you to tell me
what you have learned from exploring the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Taero Forest</> and <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Land</>.
20025238.Chinese_Text:
但我希望你能够把在泰绿林或閟玉大地
探险过程中了解到的情况告诉我。

20025239.English_Text: Could you do me this favor?

20025240.Original_Text: 이곳 물은 깨끗하고 맛도 좋아서 오랫동안 먹어왔다냥!
20025240.English_Text: This place is clean and the food is yummy, so I've been eating here for a long time, meow!
20025240.Chinese_Text: 这里的水既干净又美味，我一直都很享受喵！

20025242.Original_Text: 최근 들어 물을 마신 후에 배탈 걸린 사람들이 많다냥.
20025242.English_Text: There's been a lot of people who came down with stomachaches after drinking the water, mrrow.
20025242.Chinese_Text: 最近很多人喝水喝坏了肚子喵。

20025243.Original_Text: 물은 만물의 근원이 되는 것으로 빨리 원인을 파악해야겠다냥.
20025243.English_Text: Since water is the source of the problem, we must find the cause as soon as possible, meow.
20025243.Chinese_Text: 水是万物之源，我们需要尽快了解问题出在哪里喵。

20025245.Original_Text: 음... 계곡물에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>영향을 줄 만한 걸</> 찾아봐야겠다냥.
20025245.English_Text: Hm... I must find <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>something that could be affecting</> the valley water.
20025245.Chinese_Text: 唔...我们需要寻找能够影响溪水质量的因素喵。

20025247.English_Text: (I should collect as much I can so they can investigate it all, right?)
20025247.Chinese_Text: （先尽量搜集吧，调查就交给他们。）

20025248.English_Text: Perhaps a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>flower that can't be found</> anywhere else...

20025249.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>위생적이지 않고 위험한 것들</>이 있으면 그런 걸 챙겨가도록 하자)
20025249.English_Text: (Let's collect anything that looks <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>unclean or dangerous</>.)
20025249.Chinese_Text: （还要搜集看起来肮脏或危险的东西）

20025250.Original_Text: 음... 이건 깨끗한 곳에서만 자란다는 꽃이다냥!
20025250.English_Text: Hm... This is a flower which grows only in a pristine environment!
20025250.Chinese_Text: 嗯...这是只会在清洁环境中生长的花喵！

20025251.English_Text: Then, the flower must not be the problem.

20025252.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>동물의 사체</>도 정밀조사를 해봐야겠지만...\n오히려 물 때문에 죽었을 확률도 있다냥.
20025252.English_Text:
We should investigate the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>dead animal carcasses</>, too.
There's a chance that they died from drinking the water.
20025252.Chinese_Text:
我们也需要仔细调查动物尸体...
动物的死因反而有可能是水喵。

20025253.Original_Text: 그게 아니라도 동물이 한두 마리 죽었다고 해서\n계곡물 전체가 오염된다는 건 납득하기 어렵다냥
20025253.English_Text:
On the other hand, it's hard to believe
one or two dead animals could have contaminated the entire valley water.
20025253.Chinese_Text:
死一两只动物
不太可能污染整个溪谷喵。

20025255.Original_Text: 하지만 이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은 물질</>이 뭔지는 잘 모르겠다냥.
20025255.English_Text: But I don't know what this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>black stuff</> is, meow.
20025255.Chinese_Text: 但我不知道这个黑色物质是什么喵。

20025256.English_Text: The smell is so stinky, meow!

20025258.Original_Text: 우리 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>은 인간보다 후각이 발달해서...\n그게 아니라 의심이 간다는 이야기다냥!
20025258.English_Text:
We <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barons</> have a better sense of smell than people...
I'm saying that it's suspicious, meow!
20025258.Chinese_Text:
我们巴隆的嗅觉比人类发达...
不是有恶臭，而是比较可疑喵！

20025259.Original_Text: 혹시 누군가 의도를 가지고 뿌렸을지도 모른다냥!\n음... 모르겠다냥... 그냥 퍼롱퍼롱님께 여쭤봐야겠다냥!
20025259.English_Text:
Someone could have spread it if they had a motive!
Hmm... I don't know... I should just ask Furlong, meow!
20025259.Chinese_Text:
可能是有人怀着恶意撒下的喵！
不过为什么？完全无法猜到理由喵！

20025260.English_Text: Do you consult with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</> when such things happen?
20025260.Chinese_Text: （问发生这种事的时候会不会跟噗隆噗隆商量）

20025261.Original_Text: 당연하다냥! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>들은 사소한 일, 중요한 일 구분 없이\n뭐든 공유하고 이야기한다냥!
20025261.English_Text:
Of course, purr! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barons</> talk about and share all things,
no matter how important, meow!
20025261.Chinese_Text:
当然喵！巴隆们会事无巨细地
分享所有事情喵！

20025262.English_Text: (He has a perplexed look on his face.)

20025265.Original_Text: 제 친구 하나가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>검은 진흙지대</>를 조사하러 떠났는데...\n며칠이 지나도 돌아오질 않습니다.
20025265.English_Text:
My friend went to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blackened Mudlands</> to investigate, but...
It's been days, and she hasn't come back.
20025265.Chinese_Text:
我的一个朋友几天前去调查黏土地带...
可到现在还没回来。

20025266.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>검은 진흙지대</> 개발 반대 운동을 하던 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>다도연</>이라는 친구였는데...
20025266.English_Text:
She protested against the development of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blackened Mudlands</>.
Her name is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Da Doyon</>...
20025266.Chinese_Text:
她叫多道延，
一直反对黑色黏土地带的开发活动...

20025267.Original_Text: 설마 그럴 일은 없겠지만... \n사람이 사라지고 나니까 온갖 잡생각이 들더라고요.
20025267.English_Text:
I'm sure it isn't anything serious, but...
A person's gone missing, so I have to consider all the possibilities.
20025267.Chinese_Text:
虽然可能性很低...
但看不到人的话，总是会往坏处想。

20025268.Original_Text: 그래서 혹시 그쪽으로 가게 되시면 \n친구를 찾아달란 부탁을 드리고 싶어서요.
20025268.English_Text:
So, if you happen to go there,
I want to ask you to look for her.
20025268.Chinese_Text:
所以如果你去那里的话，
想拜托你找一下我的朋友。

20025271.Original_Text: 아. 그런 사람을 본 적은 없고요.\n있으면 제가 구조해 드렸을 텐데요.
20025271.English_Text:
Ah. I've never seen such a person.
If I did, I would've helped her.
20025271.Chinese_Text:
唔。我没见过那样的人。
如果见到的话，我一定会出手相救。

20025272.Original_Text: 여기 요즘 땅 꺼짐 현상도 있고 해서\n혼자 다니면 위험합니다.
20025272.English_Text:
Recently, some parts of the ground have been sinking in,
so it's dangerous to go alone.
20025272.Chinese_Text:
最近这里出现了地陷现象，
一个人走动非常危险。

20025273.English_Text: Plus, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>crocodiles</> can come out of nowhere and jump at people.
20025273.Chinese_Text: 偶尔还会有隐藏的鳄鱼突然跳出来。

20025274.Original_Text: 며칠 지나셨다고요?\n이런 말씀 드리긴 좀 그렇지만... 애매하네요.
20025274.English_Text:
It's been several days?
I'm sorry to say this but... I'm not hopeful.
20025274.Chinese_Text:
已经过了好几天？
虽然很抱歉...但应该没什么希望。

20025275.English_Text: I'll look around a bit more.

20025276.Original_Text: 와. 사람이 여길 오네.\n이젠 죽었다고 생각했는데...
20025276.English_Text:
Wow, someone came!
I thought I'd be done for...
20025276.Chinese_Text:
哇。没想到会有人来这里。
我还以为自己死定了...

20025278.English_Text:
That's right, I'm <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Da Doyon</>.
Please, you have to help me.
20025278.Chinese_Text:
没错。我就是多道延。
请你帮帮我。

20025279.English_Text: I came at the request of your friend.

20025282.Original_Text: 아~ <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>현재</>! 맞아. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>현재</>가 있었구나.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>현재</> 덕분이네. 이건 인정해줘야겠다.
20025282.English_Text:
Ah, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hyunjae</>! Right.
It looks like I owe <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hyunjae</> one.
20025282.Chinese_Text:
啊~贤才！没错。还有贤才。
这次多亏了贤才。我欠他一笔人情。

20025283.Original_Text: 와! 갑자기 땅이 꺼지는 바람에 쿵 하고 떨어졌는데...\n여기가 어딘지도 모르겠고...
20025283.English_Text:
The ground suddenly sunk, and I fell in...
I don't know what this place is...
20025283.Chinese_Text:
哇！地面突然塌陷，我一下子就掉下来了...
也不知道这里是什么地方...

20025284.Original_Text: 이게! 다리는 부러졌는지 아파 죽겠고...\n주변에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>악어</>들은 많아서 나가지도 못하겠고...
20025284.English_Text:
My leg hurts so badly, I think it's broken...
I can't possibly escape with all these <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>crocodiles</> lurking around.
20025284.Chinese_Text:
还有！腿痛得要死，可能已经折断了...
周围又有大量鳄鱼，没办法走出去...

20025285.Original_Text: 진짜 죽는지 알았어요. 주변에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>악어</> 좀 없애주세요.
20025285.English_Text: I really thought I'd die. Please kill some of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>crocodiles</> nearby.
20025285.Chinese_Text: 我以为自己死定了。请你帮忙消灭周围的鳄鱼。

20025286.English_Text:
Wow, this is all thanks to you.
I really owe you one.
20025286.Chinese_Text:
哇~非常感谢。
我欠你一笔人情。

20025288.Original_Text: 여기 검은 진흙의 가치가 요즘 최고조거든요.\n여기저기서 막 퍼가고 그러는데...
20025288.English_Text:
The value of the black mud here has been on the rise recently.
That's why people have been taking it...
20025288.Chinese_Text:
最近这里的黑色黏土价值急剧攀升。
各地的人都来挖走...

20025289.Original_Text: 땅 꺼짐 현상도 생기고 있고요.\n이거는 뭐... 제가 완전 증인이잖아요.
20025289.English_Text:
It's causing the ground to sink in, too.
That's, well... I'm proof of that.
20025289.Chinese_Text:
所以才会发生地陷现象。
这可真是...我就是活生生的证人。

20025290.Original_Text: 여기 살던 동물들도 막 떠나고 있어요.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>악어</>들은 왜 안 떠나는지 모르겠는데... 그냥 확 죽어버리지.
20025290.English_Text:
The animals that used to live here are all leaving.
I don't know why the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>crocodiles</> won't leave, but... I kind of hope they all just disappear.
20025290.Chinese_Text:
原本栖息在这里的动物们也都离开了。
不知道鳄鱼为什么不离开...干脆全都死掉吧。

20025291.Original_Text: 아니다. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>악어</>들도 살아야죠. \n각자가 자기 영역을 가지고 살아야 하니까
20025291.English_Text:
I shouldn't say that. The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>crocodiles</> have to live, too.
Every creature has a right to live.
20025291.Chinese_Text:
不对。鳄鱼也需要生存。
每个动物都需要自己的生存领域。

20025293.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>는 이런 거 알고 있으려나요? 모르겠죠?\n여기 땅을 파든 퍼먹든 상관이나 하겠어요.
20025293.English_Text:
Does the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> know about this? They don't, right?
They wouldn't care, even if this land was swallowed up completely!
20025293.Chinese_Text:
四虎知道这种情况吗？应该不知道吧？
他们才不会在乎这里的黏土发生什么事。

20025294.Original_Text: (혹시 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>를 만나게 되면\n이번 일에 대해 전달하겠다고 한다)
20025294.English_Text: I'll tell the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> what happened if I happen to meet them.
20025294.Chinese_Text:
（表示以后遇到四虎时
一定会转告这里的事情）

20025295.Original_Text: 그렇게 해주시면 완전 고맙죠.\n저는 마을로 돌아갈게요. 감사합니다!
20025295.English_Text:
I'd be grateful if you'd do that.
I'll head back to the village, then. Thank you!
20025295.Chinese_Text:
那样再好不过。
我要回村庄了。非常感谢！

20025296.Original_Text: 혹시 폭포 관광을 위해 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원 계곡</>에 오신 겁니까?
20025296.English_Text: Have you come to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</> to take a tour of the waterfall?
20025296.Chinese_Text: 请问你是不是为了游览瀑布而来到乐猿溪谷呢？

20025297.English_Text: I'm not here for a tour.
20025297.Chinese_Text: （表示来到这里的目的不是旅游）

20025298.Original_Text: 그렇군요. 실례했습니다.\n관광으로 오셨던 분들이 위험에 빠지는 경우가 있어서요.
20025298.English_Text:
I see. Sorry for the misunderstanding.
There's been cases of tourists getting into dangerous situations.
20025298.Chinese_Text:
原来如此，失礼了。
因为来到这里的游客经常会陷入危险。

20025299.Original_Text: 미리 경고를 드리고, \n가능하면 돌려보내는 쪽을 권하고 있습니다.
20025299.English_Text:
So I warned them,
and recommended that they leave if they can.
20025299.Chinese_Text:
我在这里警告游客，
劝告人们尽量回去。

20025300.English_Text: I should do that if that's what the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> want.
20025300.Chinese_Text: （表示既然是搜阳的警告，愿意听从建议）

20025301.Original_Text: 아뇨... 그게 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에서 하는 경고라기보단\n제 개인적인 의견이라서요.
20025301.English_Text:
No... The warning is not from the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
It's just my personal opinion.
20025301.Chinese_Text:
不...这不是搜阳的警告，
而是我的个人意见。

20025303.Original_Text: 폭포로 갈 때 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해맞이 비탈길</>을 많이 이용하는데...\n그곳은 그렇게 안전한 곳은 아닙니다.
20025303.English_Text:
People mostly use the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sunrise Climb</> to get to the waterfall but...
That area isn't very safe.
20025303.Chinese_Text:
去瀑布时，一般会经过迎日坡路...
但那里并不安全。

20025304.Original_Text: 근데 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에서도 공식적으로 경고를 하지 않고,\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>들도 별말이 없습니다.
20025304.English_Text:
However, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> aren't making an official warning,
and the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> aren't saying anything, either.
20025304.Chinese_Text:
可是搜阳没有发布正式警告，
四虎那边也没有任何表示。

20025305.Original_Text: 사람들은 절경이라고 하니 보러 옵니다.\n사고가 없으면 다행이고 다들 좋지만...
20025305.English_Text:
People come to see the beautiful scenery.
It would be nice if there were no accidents, but...
20025305.Chinese_Text:
人们听说这里是绝景就想来观赏。
如果不发生事故还好...

20025307.English_Text: Would you go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Climb</> with me, if that's all right with you?
20025307.Chinese_Text: 如果方便的话，可以跟我一起去看坡路吗？

20025308.Original_Text: 다들 소협 정도의 무공을 가지고 있다면야\n상관없겠습니다만...
20025308.English_Text:
It'd be great if everyone was
as skilled as you, but...
20025308.Chinese_Text:
如果大家都有大侠这般武功，
当然没有问题...

20025309.Original_Text: 그렇지 못한 분들의 출입이 점점 늘어나고 있습니다.
20025309.English_Text: More and more people who don't know what they're doing are coming here.
20025309.Chinese_Text: 但越来越多武功平凡的人们在访问这里。

20025310.English_Text:
Actually, it's not even just this place.
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Lapriel</> are also a threat...
20025310.Chinese_Text:
其实不只这一个地方。
这里还遭受着兔面族的威胁...

20025311.Original_Text: 저기 아래쪽에는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원족</>들도 있죠.\n그들이 언제 사람들을 습격할지 모릅니다.
20025311.English_Text:
And the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Simyu</> are down there, too.
They might attack people unprovoked.
20025311.Chinese_Text:
下面那个地方还有乐猿族。
不知道乐猿族什么时候会袭击人类。

20025313.Original_Text: 아직까진 괜찮은 것 같습니다.\n하지만 사람들이 실수로 접근했다가 피해를 보긴 했죠.
20025313.English_Text:
It's been fine for now.
However, some people have become injured when they accidentally got too close.
20025313.Chinese_Text:
目前为止问题不大。
但人们有时会走错路接近乐猿族的地盘，然后遇到事故。

20025314.Original_Text: 이렇게 위험한데 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>과 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>는 무슨 의도를 가지고\n관광을 허용하고, 출입하는 사람들을 방치하는 걸까요?
20025314.English_Text:
Why are the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> allowing tourists
and letting people come here when it's this dangerous?
20025314.Chinese_Text:
这里有很多危险因素，不知道搜阳和四虎为何
允许旅游，对进出的人们坐视不管呢？

20025315.Original_Text: 현장은 너무 위험합니다.\n저라면 일반인들의 출입을 제한할 겁니다.
20025315.English_Text:
It's really unsafe.
I would've restricted access to civilians if it were up to me.
20025315.Chinese_Text:
现场非常危险。
如果是我的话，一定会限制普通民众的进出。

20025316.Original_Text: 이런 결정을 내리는 주체들이 \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원 계곡</>이 어떤 곳인지 잘 모르는 게 아닐까요?
20025316.English_Text:
Maybe the people that make the decisions
don't know what kind of place <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</> is?
20025316.Chinese_Text:
做出这种决定的人们
大概不知道乐猿溪谷有多危险吧？

20025317.English_Text:
I'll talk to the higher-ups among the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>
or the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> if I meet them.)
20025317.Chinese_Text:
（表示遇到搜阳或四虎的高层人士时
一定会转告他的话）

20025318.English_Text: You there! Come here for a moment, eek eek!
20025318.Chinese_Text: 那个人类！来这里一下奇奇！

20025320.Original_Text: 눈도 마주쳤으면서 뭘 또 확인하는 거냐끼끼!\n여기는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>낙원족</>의 영역인데 왜 들어온 거냐우끼끼?
20025320.English_Text:
Why are you not looking me in the eye, eek eek?
Why are you here when this is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Simyu</> territory, hoo hoo?
20025320.Chinese_Text:
已经对上眼了还问什么奇奇！
这里是乐猿族的领域，你为什么擅自闯进来奇奇？

20025321.English_Text: I'm just passing through. I have no ill intentions.
20025321.Chinese_Text: （表示只是路过而已，没有其他意图）

20025322.English_Text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Simyu</> have been attacked by people recently, eek eek!
Even though we are a peaceful race, hoo hoo!
20025322.Chinese_Text:
最近乐猿族受到了人类的攻击奇奇！
我们可是喜好和平的种族奇奇！

20025323.Original_Text: 너도 혹시 말은 그렇게 하고\n우릴 공격하러 온 거 아니냐끼끼?
20025323.English_Text:
Maybe you're just saying that,
but you're actually here to attack us, eek eek?
20025323.Chinese_Text:
你嘴上这么说，
其实想攻击我们吧奇奇？

20025324.English_Text: I absolutely have no intention of doing that.

20025325.Original_Text: 우리 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>낙원족</>은 바보가 아니다끼끼!\n영역을 침입한 자들에겐 주먹을 보여준다우끼끼!
20025325.English_Text:
We <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Simyu</> are not stupid, eek eek!
We show the might of our fists to those who invade our territory, hoo hoo!
20025325.Chinese_Text:
我们乐猿族不是傻瓜奇奇！
对入侵者从来都是拳脚相向奇奇！

20025326.English_Text: But we never attack first, eek eek!
20025326.Chinese_Text: 但我们不会率先发动袭击奇奇！

20025328.English_Text:
If you get it, then help us out, eek eek.
After that, we'll believe in your innocence, hoo hoo!
20025328.Chinese_Text:
那就来帮我们奇奇。
我们会认同你的清白奇奇！

20025329.Original_Text: 우리 영역을 침입한 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>거미들</>을 몰아내 달라끼끼!\n그리고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>거미들</>의 영역 표시를 없애 줘라우끼끼!
20025329.English_Text:
Chase away the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spiders</> that invaded our territory, eek eek!
And destroy the territory markers of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spiders</>, too, hoo hoo!
20025329.Chinese_Text:
赶走入侵我们领域的蜘蛛奇奇！
还要毁掉蜘蛛的领域标记奇奇！

20025330.Original_Text: 과거 인간들이 이 땅에 들어왔을 때,\n그들이 대장과 대화해서 영역을 정했었다끼끼!
20025330.English_Text:
When people came to this land in the past,
they divided the territories up with our boss, eek eek!
20025330.Chinese_Text:
过去人类侵犯这片土地时，
我们与人类队长谈判，规定了各自的领域奇奇！

20025331.Original_Text: 근데 인간들은 왜 그 약속을 지키지 않는거냐끼끼!
20025331.English_Text: But why aren't the people keeping their promise, eek eek!?
20025331.Chinese_Text: 可是人类为什么不遵守约定奇奇！

20025332.Original_Text: 왜 계속 인간들의 영역을 넓혀 나가고 있는 거냐끼끼!
20025332.English_Text: Why are the people constantly expanding their territory, eek eek!?
20025332.Chinese_Text: 人类为什么不断拓展领域奇奇！

20025333.Original_Text: (딱히 대답한 말을 찾지 못하고 가만히 있기로 한다)
20025333.English_Text: (I should stay silent as I can't find a good answer.)

20025334.Chinese_Text: 我们乐猿族无法理解奇奇！

20025335.English_Text: Do you <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Simyus</> keep their promises as well?

20025336.Original_Text: 내가 모든 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>낙원족</>을 대표해서 말하긴 어렵다끼끼.\n약속을 지키고 안 지키고는 개인에 따라 다르다우끼끼!
20025336.English_Text:
It's difficult for me to speak for all <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Simyu</>, eek eek.
Whether one keeps a promise or not is dependent on the individual, hoo hoo!
20025336.Chinese_Text:
我无法代表所有乐猿族奇奇。
每个乐猿族遵守约定的程度都有所不同奇奇！

20025337.Original_Text: 하지만 아까와 같은 약속은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>낙원대성</>님이 두 눈을 뜨고 계시는데\n어떤 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>낙원족</>이 약속을 어길 생각을 하겠는가끼끼?
20025337.English_Text:
But what <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Simyu</> would think of breaking a promise
when <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ape King Ogong</> is watching with his own two eyes?
20025337.Chinese_Text:
不过像刚才提到的约定是乐猿大圣也遵守的约定，
哪个乐猿族胆敢毁掉约定奇奇？

20025338.English_Text: There is no <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Simyu</> that would not keep a promise sworn on <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ape King Ogong</>, eek eek!
20025338.Chinese_Text: 没有哪个乐猿族会毁掉乐猿大圣遵守的约定奇奇！

20025339.English_Text: (Once again, I should nod. I don't have anything to say.)

20025340.Original_Text: 너는 좋은 인간처럼 보인다끼끼!\n하지만 모든 인간을 믿을 수는 없다우끼끼.
20025340.English_Text:
You seem like a good person, eek eek!
But I can't trust all people, eek eek!
20025340.Chinese_Text:
你看起来像一个好人奇奇！
但我无法相信所有人类奇奇。

20025342.English_Text: (He seems to be looking for something.)

20025343.Original_Text: 아. 소협! 여기서 이렇게 뵙게 되는군요.
20025343.Chinese_Text: 啊，大侠！没想到会在这里见到你。

20025344.Original_Text: 안그래도 한번 찾아 뵈어야 겠다고 생각했는데...\n그동안 별고 없으셨습니까?
20025344.English_Text:
I was thinking of visiting you soon...
Have you been well?
20025344.Chinese_Text:
我还想去找你呢...
这段时间过得好吗？

20025345.Original_Text: (안 그래도 하고 싶은 말이 있었다고 한다)
20025345.English_Text: I have something to talk about.

20025346.English_Text: With me? Oh, what is it?
20025346.Chinese_Text: 对我吗？那个...大概是什么内容呢...

20025347.Original_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원 계곡</>의 상황에 대해서 \n사람들이 말해준 이야기를 전하고 싶다고 한다)
20025347.English_Text:
I want to talk about the situation that 
the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</> people told you about.
20025347.Chinese_Text:
（表示想把人们告诉自己的有关
乐猿溪谷的事情转告给他）

20025348.Original_Text: 혹시 괜찮으시면 자리를 옮겨서... \n밤말은 쥐가 듣고 그런다고 하니까요.
20025348.English_Text:
If it's fine with you, let's move somewhere else...
As they say, the walls have ears.
20025348.Chinese_Text:
是否可以换个地方说话...
正所谓没有不透风的墙。

20025349.English_Text: It's not something to be so secretive about.
20025349.Chinese_Text: （表示并不是那么秘密的事情）

20025350.Original_Text: 그래도 신중한 게 좋죠. \n낮말은 새가 듣고 그런다고 하니까요.
20025350.English_Text:
But it's better to be cautious.
You can never be too sure.
20025350.Chinese_Text:
最好还是慎重起见，
只怕隔墙有耳。

20025351.Original_Text: 그럼 말씀하시죠. 혹시 모르니 소리를 조금 낮춰서...
20025351.English_Text: Now speak. Lower your voice, because you never know...
20025351.Chinese_Text: 请说吧。最好还是低声一点...

20025353.English_Text: No... Something like that really happened at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</>?
20025353.Chinese_Text: 什么...乐猿溪谷竟然发生了那种事情？

20025354.English_Text: It'd be helpful if you tell the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> about this.
20025354.Chinese_Text: （表示希望他把事情转告四虎）

20025355.English_Text: Sure. Of course I'll tell them.

20025356.Original_Text: 부끄럽습니다. 보고서나 읽었을 뿐이지. \n뭐 하나 제대로 파악한 게 없었군요.
20025356.English_Text:
I'm embarrassed. I've only read the reports.
I haven't actually heard anything like this.
20025356.Chinese_Text:
真是惭愧。我只是看过报告书而已。
没有实际了解现场情况。

20025357.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원 계곡</>의 현지 사정에 대해서 전혀 모르고 있었습니다.\n아직 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>가 해월대륙에서 자리를 잡지 못했기 때문이겠죠.
20025357.English_Text:
I didn't know about the situation in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</> at all.
I bet it's because the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> has not yet settled in Haewol.
20025357.Chinese_Text:
我完全不知道乐猿溪谷内正在发生什么事。
这也是因为四虎还未在海越大陆站稳脚跟。

20025358.Original_Text: 체계도 제대로 잡혀 있지 않고, 보고도 아마 어디선가 새고 있을 겁니다.\n저 같은 관리자가 제대로 일을 하지 못했기 때문입니다.
20025358.English_Text:
They're not yet organized, and even the reports are probably being leaked somewhere.
It's because managers like me haven't been doing a good job.
20025358.Chinese_Text:
不仅体系不健全，报告也有不少疏漏。
都怪像我这样的管理员没有做好分内的事情。

20025359.English_Text: You can do well from now on.

20025360.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>님은... 제 선친과 친구 관계셨기 때문에\n저를 마치 친아들처럼 키워주시고 믿어주셨는데...
20025360.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</> was friends with my deceased father,
so he raised me like his own son and trusted me, but...
20025360.Chinese_Text:
郭浩龙大人...是先父的好友，
因此把我当成亲生儿子一样培养，也很信任我...

20025361.Original_Text: 저는 이렇게 부족한 사람이어서 무엇 하나 해내지 못하고 있네요.\n송구스러울 따름입니다.
20025361.English_Text:
I'm so lacking that I haven't been able to do a single thing right.
I cannot help but feel sorry for myself.
20025361.Chinese_Text:
但我缺点很多，什么事都做不好。
真是万分惭愧。

20025362.Original_Text: (뭘 탓한다기보단 이야기를 전하려고 했을 뿐이라고 한다)
20025362.English_Text: I only wanted to tell you what I've heard, not place any blame.
20025362.Chinese_Text: （表示自己不是来责怪他，而是转告事情而已）

20025363.Original_Text: 고맙습니다. 제가 드릴 말씀이 없습니다.\n앞으로 잘하겠습니다.
20025363.English_Text:
Thank you. I've got nothing to say.
I'll do better from now on.
20025363.Chinese_Text:
非常感谢。真是不好意思。
我今后会好好努力。

20025364.Chinese_Text: （感觉尴尬，表示明白他的立场后结束对话）

20025365.English_Text: Word of your deeds have spread far and wide.
20025365.Chinese_Text: 听说你最近的表现非常活跃。

20025367.English_Text: Can we ask you for a favor, too?
20025367.Chinese_Text: 我们也可以拜托你一件事吗？

20025369.English_Text: The expedition is trying to investigate the area near the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>shipwreck</>.

20025370.English_Text:
Originally, we were supposed to get some help from
members of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>...
20025370.Chinese_Text:
原本应该在<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>队员们的协助下
进行探查，但…

20025371.English_Text:
But the people in our expedition
don't seem to be very fond of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
20025371.Chinese_Text:
我们的探查队员们好像有些
不喜欢<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>队员们。

20025372.English_Text: It's something that we need to work on, of course...
20025372.Chinese_Text: 我们当然也需要纠正这一点…

20025374.Original_Text: 저희 대원을 만나 이야기를 한번 들어보시겠습니까?
20025374.English_Text: Will you pay our members a visit and listen to what they have to say?
20025374.Chinese_Text: 可以请你去听听我们队员们的想法吗？

20025376.Chinese_Text: 少侠愿意跟我们一起去吗？

20025377.English_Text: Wow! We'd be delighted if that's the case!

20025379.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>난파선의 무덤</> 쪽입니다.\n뭔가 새로운 게 있을 것 같습니다.
20025379.English_Text:
We will investigate the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Shipwreck Gravesite</>.
We think we can find something new there.
20025379.Chinese_Text:
我们准备去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>遇难船墓地</>。
在那里应该会有新的发现。

20025380.English_Text: Then, let's get going right away!

20025381.Original_Text: 오셨습니까? \n아! 지금 정말 굉장한 걸 발견했습니다.
20025381.English_Text:
You're here.
Ah! I found something amazing just now.
20025381.Chinese_Text:
你来了？
啊！我们刚刚发现了惊人事实。

20025383.English_Text: I think the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</> are here.

20025384.Original_Text: 아마 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에선 아직 파악하지 못한 정보인 것 같습니다.
20025384.English_Text: And it appears that the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> do not have this information yet.
20025384.Chinese_Text: 看来<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>还没有掌握相关信息。

20025385.Original_Text: 이걸 알려주면, 저희에 대한 평가가 좋아지겠죠?
20025385.English_Text: If we tell them about this, it will definitely improve our standing with them.
20025385.Chinese_Text: 如果把这个情报告诉搜阳，应该可以提升对我们的评价吧？

20025386.Original_Text: 속마음을 알고 보면 좋은 분들이라고는 하지만...
20025386.English_Text: I know they are good people and all...

20025387.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>대원들이 저흴 아래로 보는 듯한 그런 기분이 들었거든요.
20025387.English_Text: But we felt that the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> were looking down on us.
20025387.Chinese_Text: 我们总有种感觉，就是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>队员们有些瞧不起我们。

20025388.English_Text: Why did you feel that way?

20025389.Original_Text: 제가 과하게 생각한 걸 수도 있습니다만...\n어쨌든 이건 굉장한 정보라고요.
20025389.English_Text:
It might just be us overthinking things...
Anyway, this is great information.
20025389.Chinese_Text:
也可能是我想多了…
总之这是很重要的信息。

20025390.English_Text: Let's defeat the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</> and take their supplies.
20025390.Chinese_Text: 消灭<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>苍盗团</>，把他们的东西都带回去吧。

20025391.English_Text: It's time we properly investigate the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>shipwreck</>.

20025393.Original_Text: 알겠습니다. 제가 위치를 알고 있으니 먼저 출발하겠습니다.
20025393.English_Text: Understood. Since I know the location, I'll be heading out first.
20025393.Chinese_Text: 好的。我知道位置，先出发了。

20025394.Chinese_Text: 我们就在那边里面的<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>遇难船</>上见吧。

20025395.English_Text: We will now begin our investigation.
20025395.Chinese_Text: 那么我们先开始探查了。

20025396.English_Text: I'll go eliminate the nearby monsters.

20025397.English_Text: Understood. Then, we'll be counting on you.

20025398.English_Text: Thanks to you, the investigation went smoothly.
20025398.Chinese_Text: 承蒙相助，探查进行得很顺利。

20025400.Original_Text: 매번 이렇게 일이 잘 풀리면 얼마나 좋겠습니까?
20025400.English_Text: Wouldn't it be nice if things always went this smoothly?
20025400.Chinese_Text: 如果每次都能这样顺利地办事该有多好？

20025401.Original_Text: 소협님만 안 바쁘시면 매일 같이 다니고 싶습니다!
20025401.English_Text: I'd love to always go with you if you weren't so busy!
20025401.Chinese_Text: 如果少侠不忙，我想每天都一起做事！

20025402.English_Text: Sorry, but that would be difficult.

20025403.Original_Text: 알고 있습니다. 그냥 해 본 소리죠. 하하!
20025403.English_Text: I know that. This was just wishful thinking on my part. Haha!
20025403.Chinese_Text: 明白。我只是随口说说而已，哈哈！

20025404.Original_Text: 이제 슬슬 돌아갈 건데... 그게... 그게 말이죠.
20025404.English_Text: It's about time to go back. But... there's a problem.
20025404.Chinese_Text: 我们也该回去了…不过…那个…

20025405.English_Text: What's the problem? You can tell me.

20025406.English_Text: I feel kind of awkward, telling the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> about the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</>.
20025406.Chinese_Text: 我不太想把<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>苍盗团</>的事情转告给<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>。

20025407.Original_Text: 혹시 괜찮으시면 대신 말씀해주실 수 있을까요?
20025407.English_Text: If it's all right with you, can you tell them for us?
20025407.Chinese_Text: 如果方便的话，可以替我们转告一下吗？

20025408.Original_Text: 그... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>고곤대</>님 말고 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>순누비</> 대원분께 전달하시면\n이야기가 부드럽게 진행될 겁니다.
20025408.English_Text:
So... if you tell <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soon Nubi</> instead of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ko Gondae</>,
things should go along much better.
20025408.Chinese_Text:
那个…不要找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>古昆代</>大人，转告给<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>孙娄毕</>队员的话
应该能顺利地进行交谈。

20025410.English_Text: I came here for the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</> at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Traceless Shore</>.
20025410.Chinese_Text: （转告在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>无脚印海岸</>解决<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>苍盗团</>的事情）

20025411.Original_Text: 그곳은 사람들의 출입이 거의 없는 곳인데...\n반대로 말하면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>창도단</>이 숨기 적당한 곳이군요.
20025411.English_Text:
That place doesn't get too many visitors...
That makes it a perfect place for the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</> to hide.
20025411.Chinese_Text:
那里人迹罕至…
正因如此，也很适合<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>苍盗团</>藏身。

20025412.Original_Text: 이런 중요한 정보를 알려 주시다니 감사드립니다.
20025412.English_Text: Thank you for telling us about something so important.
20025412.Chinese_Text: 谢谢你告诉我们这种重要的信息。

20025413.English_Text: The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom Member</> was very helpful.

20025414.English_Text: So, it was a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom Member</> who found out about this.
20025414.Chinese_Text: 原来是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花团团员</>们提供了帮助。

20025415.English_Text: I'll tell <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ko Gondae</> about it, including the part about Plum Blossom.
20025415.Chinese_Text: 包括这事在内，我一定会悉数转告给<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>古昆代</>大人。

20025418.Original_Text: (직접 가서 물건도 건네주고\n이야기도 하면 좋을 것 같다고 한다)
20025418.English_Text:
It'd be nice to go hand things over
and talk in person.
20025418.Chinese_Text:
（他说直接过去把货交出来谈就好了
）

20025419.English_Text: How do you know Shin Haywol?

20025420.Original_Text: 제가 전도유망한 청년을 만났다고 말씀드리지 않았나요?\n바로 그 청년입니다!
20025420.English_Text:
Didn't I tell you that I met a promising young talent?
This is that talent!
20025420.Chinese_Text:
我不是告诉过你我遇到了一个很有前途的年轻人吗？
那个年轻人！

20025421.English_Text: I didn't know the person you mentioned was Shin Haywol.
20025421.Chinese_Text: （据说当时他不知道说话的人是申海月）

20025422.English_Text: Was the stem I brought good enough?

20025423.Original_Text: 아 맞아요! 줄기! 강도나 유연성이 너무 좋아요!\n바구니 만들기에 딱입니다!
20025423.English_Text:
Ah, right! The stem! Its strength and flexibility are great!
It's ideal for making baskets!
20025423.Chinese_Text:
啊对！干！我喜欢它的力量和灵活性！
 非常适合制作篮子！

20025424.Original_Text: 정말이십니까? 큰 힘이 될 것 같습니다.
20025424.Chinese_Text: 你真的？看起来这将是一个巨大的帮助。
